sentences.en: ‘I feel seasick already,’ she moaned.
sentences.cn: “我已经开始晕船了。”她抱怨道。

sentences.en: " I just don't know what to do,'she would moan.
sentences.cn: " 我就是不知道怎么办好, " 她诉苦说.

sentences.en: a low moan
sentences.cn: 低沉的呻吟声

sentences.en: Bill, It'shouldn't have been like this,'she continued to moan.
sentences.cn: “比尔, 事情本来不应该是这个样子的, ” 她继续呜咽着说.

sentences.en: He always has some moan or another.
sentences.cn: 他总是抱怨这抱怨那.

sentences.en: He let out this long ululating moan.
sentences.cn: 他发出这种痛苦的长嚎。

sentences.en: He moaned and groaned all the way there.
sentences.cn: 他去的一路上抱怨个没完。

sentences.en: I laugh too, but I moan too.
sentences.cn: 我也跟着笑了, 不过同时我也悲叹.

sentences.en: I loathe negativity. I can't stand people who moan.
sentences.cn: 我厌恶消极态度，不能忍受唉声叹气的人。

sentences.en: It is outrageous that people doing well-paid jobs should moan about how badly off they are.
sentences.cn: 那些有着高薪工作的人竟然还抱怨自己多么缺钱，真是过分。

sentences.en: Mary gave a low moan , - and then implored Sally to change the subject.
sentences.cn: 玛丽轻轻地叹了一口气,便要求莎莉不要再讲到这个题目.

sentences.en: She gave a little moan of pleasure.
sentences.cn: 她轻轻地发出一声快乐的呻吟。

sentences.en: She moaned and cried out in pain.
sentences.cn: 她痛得又是呻吟又是喊叫。

sentences.en: She was at her last gasp , unable even to moan.
sentences.cn: 虎妞只剩了大口的咽气, 已经不会出声.

sentences.en: The fear of his own death overcame him and he began to moan again.
sentences.cn: 他忽然警觉自己不久人世,又开始呜咽起来.

sentences.en: They moan on a lot about money.
sentences.cn: 他们对钱的事情抱怨不已。

sentences.en: Tony moaned in his sleep and then turned over on his side.
sentences.cn: 托尼在睡梦中呻吟了一下，然后转身侧躺。

sentences.en: We had a good moan about the weather.
sentences.cn: 我们对天气着实抱怨了一番.

sentences.en: We heard the moan of the wind last night.
sentences.cn: 昨晚,我们听到了萧萧风声.

sentences.en: We were struggling to bite back a sympathetic moan.
sentences.cn: 我们努力咽下同情的悲叹声.

sentences.en: You can go see him and have a good old moan.
sentences.cn: 你可以去看看他，好好地诉诉苦。

trans.tran_cn: 呻吟声，悲叹声，（尤指风的）呼啸声
trans.tran_en: a long low sound expressing pain, unhappiness, or sexual pleasure
to make a long low sound expressing pain, unhappiness, or sexual pleasure

trans.tran_cn: 呻吟，发出呻吟般的凄切声，悲叹，抱怨
trans.tran_en: to complain in an annoying way, especially in an unhappy voice and without good reason
to complain in an annoying way, especially in an unhappy voice and without good reason

trans.tran_cn: 以呻吟声说出，悲叹，抱怨，哀悼
trans.tran_en: to complain in an annoying way, especially in an unhappy voice and without good reason
